statements: SELECT * FROM access_control_permissions;
SELECT user_name, permission_level FROM access_control_permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_control_permissions ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_name, permission_level FROM access_control_permissions WHERE permission_level > 1 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, permission_level FROM access_control_permissions WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, permission_level FROM access_control_permissions WHERE permission_level > 1 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, permission_level FROM access_control_permissions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM access_control_permissions WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM access_control_permissions WHERE permission_level = 3;
SELECT user_id, user_name, permission_level FROM access_control_permissions WHERE permission_level < 3 ORDER BY permission_level DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control;
SELECT id, user_id, permission_level FROM access_control WHERE id = 1;
SELECT permission_level, user_id FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM quantum_data;
SELECT id, data_type, data_content FROM quantum_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE permission_level > 2;
SELECT id, user_id FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_control GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, data_type FROM quantum_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND data_type LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT * FROM access_control AS ac JOIN quantum_data AS qd ON ac.id = qd.id;
SELECT * FROM quantum_users;
SELECT username, role FROM quantum_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT data_name, data_content FROM quantum_data WHERE data_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control ORDER BY permission DESC;
SELECT user_id, data_id FROM access_control WHERE permission = 'read' AND user_id = '98765432-4321-4321-4321-210987654cba';
SELECT * FROM quantum_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM quantum_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT DISTINCT data_name, data_content FROM quantum_data WHERE data_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY data_name ASC;
SELECT u.username, d.data_name, ac.permission FROM quantum_users u JOIN quantum_data d ON u.user_id = d.user_id JOIN access_control ac ON u.user_id = ac.user_id WHERE ac.permission = 'read';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_data FROM quantum_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_data > 1 ORDER BY num_data DESC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_users;
SELECT username, password FROM quantum_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM quantum_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT permission_name FROM quantum_permissions WHERE permission_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM quantum_users;
SELECT username, password FROM quantum_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM quantum_users JOIN user_roles ON quantum_users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN quantum_roles ON user_roles.role_id = quantum_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM quantum_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT username, permission_name FROM quantum_users CROSS JOIN quantum_permissions ORDER BY username LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM access_control;
SELECT user_id, role FROM access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM logs WHERE action = 'login' AND user_id = 123;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role, permission FROM access_control WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT user_id, role FROM access_control WHERE role = 'editor' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT source_name, quantum_data FROM data_sources WHERE source_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%data%' ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
